name: Sky Jumper (L3104)
description:
Game made to learn C++ with Unreal. Based on the Hour of Code files

Jump across the sky in SkyJumper!

Walk, Sprint and Jump across the floating islands collecting coins and hidden gems. Collect the key to unlock the final room and reach the goal.

SkyJumper is a 3D platforming game made in Unreal for a USC Game Development class

Controls:

WASD - Walk

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

E - Interact (With Door)

Esc - Quit
